description: Triangular array T read by rows: T(n,k)=number of Farey fractions of order n that are <=1/k; k=1,2,...,n; n=1,2,3,...
comments: So, T(n, k) is also the index of fraction 1/k in the Farey fractions of order n. - _Michel Marcus_, Jun 27 2014
prog: (PARI) row(nn) = my(frow = farey(n)); for (k=1, n, print1(vecsearch(frow, 1/k), ", ");); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jun 27 2014
author: _Clark Kimberling_
